# convertPoint(fromView:)

**Instance Method**

Converts a point from view coordinates to scene coordinates.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func convertPoint(fromView point: CGPoint) -> CGPoint
```

## Parameters

- **point**: A point in view coordinates.

## Return Value

The same point in the scene’s coordinate system.

## Discussion

The scene must be presented in a view before calling this method.

## Converting Between Coordinate Systems

- **convertPoint(toView:)**: Converts a point from scene coordinates to view coordinates.
